content:
My favorite track is probably "So What". I love the way the whole band comes together to create this infectious, laid-back groove. I've been trying to capture some of that laid-back feel in my own music by experimenting with slower tempos and more relaxed drum patterns. I've also been playing around with jazz-inspired chord progressions and improvising over them with my guitar. It's been really fun to explore this new territory and see where it takes me.

Speaking of guitar, I've been thinking about getting back into playing more regularly. I haven't played in a while, but being in Hawaii and listening to all the great music there really inspired me to pick it up again. Do you have any tips on how to get back into playing guitar after a long break?
